fields.value: Replication data for: MIPEX as a Measure of Citizenship Models

dsDescriptionValue.value: Replication material for Ruedin, Didier. 2015. “Increasing Validity by Recombining Existing Indices: MIPEX as a Measure of Citizenship Models.” Social Science Quarterly. Data from the MIPEX are recombined to provide a measure of citizenship models based on theory (Koopmans and Statham).

publicationCitation.value: Ruedin, Didier. 2015. “Increasing validity by recombining existing indices: MIPEX as a measure of citizenship models.” Social Science Quarterly 96(2): 629-638.

value: Alberti, Camilla; Ruedin, Didier; D'Amato, Gianni, 2015, "Immigration and Integration Policy in Switzerland, 1848 to 2014", http://dx.doi.org/10.7910/DVN/27991

files.description: Recombined MIPEX Data, essentially the long table in the paper; needed for replication code
files.label: mipexkoop.2.tab

files.description: CSV file with aggregate scores; needed for replication code
files.label: MIPEX-Koopmans-Aggregate.csv

dataFile.description: CSV file with aggregate scores; needed for replication code

files.description: Excel Spreadsheet with the MIPEX scores and their recombination. The following tabs are included: "Q" with the MIPEX questionnaire, "xk" with the recombination and aggregation of scores, "2010" and "2007" for the MIPEX scores. Refer to MIPEX (http://mipex.eu/) for full documentation on the underlying MIPEX data and updates. This datafile cannot replace the official MIPEX data, which are available from: http://www.mipex.eu/download
files.label: MIPEX Recombined.xlsx

dataFile.description: Excel Spreadsheet with the MIPEX scores and their recombination. The following tabs are included: "Q" with the MIPEX questionnaire, "xk" with the recombination and aggregation of scores, "2010" and "2007" for the MIPEX scores. Refer to MIPEX (http://mipex.eu/) for full documentation on the underlying MIPEX data and updates. This datafile cannot replace the official MIPEX data, which are available from: http://www.mipex.eu/download

files.description: Extract from the MIPEX files [2007-2010] giving the questions indicated in the paper, alongside corresponding questions for the MIPEX files 2012+ where the order has changed a bit, and a few questions were changed.
files.label: Questions.xlsx
